testcase.name: Add Location
testcase.system-out: Given User is at the login page.............................................passed When User enters correct Username and Password..............................passed And User clicks on the login Button.........................................passed Then User should be able to login...........................................passed Given User is on the Dashboard Page.........................................passed When User clicks on Admin panel.............................................passed And User clicks on Oraganization section....................................passed And User click on Locations link............................................passed Then Locations page should be dispalyed.....................................passed And User clicks on Add Location Icon........................................passed Then Add location form should be displayed..................................passed And User enters the location details........................................passed And click on Save button....................................................passed Then Sucessfully saved message should be displayed..........................passed And Location added should be in the Locations list..........................passed
